name: Jetman (CrXisHere)
description:
Hello and welcome to my first 2d game.

I am so so so so so grateful for you downloading this, as this shows my first real progress on a 2d game.

I am just starting my journey so please leave any tips down in the comments below!

Feedback is welcomed!

You play the game by pressing the left mouse button! Have Fun.

Edit:Jetman v1.1 has been fixed the app can run now.
